name: @creditkarma/vault-client
description: A client for communicating with Hashicorp Vault written in TypeScript

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && tsc
scripts.pretest: npm run build && npm run docker
scripts.test: wait-on --timeout 20000 http://localhost:8201 && npm run lint && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release:publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release:publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release:publish

author: Credit Karma
